title: Roasted butternut squash and apple soup
ingredients: ['1 butternut squash, halved lengthwise and seeded', '1 large carrot, cut into large chunks', '1 sweet potato, cut into large chunks', '1 whole bulb of garlic', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 celery sticks, sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and sliced', '1 litre vegetable stock', '240ml apple juice or apple cider']
